description: Each Antonym: Genesis NFT also represents a physical counterpart.
Using the Redemption Portal, your (1) Antonym NFT unlocks the option to redeem a 12” art toy from its respective capsule.
Holders with 4 NFTs unlock the option to redeem a 24” art toy from any capsule, as well as limited Antonym: Black 12" edition.
Holders with 20 NFTs unlock the option to redeem a 60” edition of any capsule, or a bespoke physical in collaboration with the Antonym Art Dept, as well as limited Antonym: Black 24" edition.
Each Antonym can only be redeemed once.
